descriptionHtml:
===============================================================
EMPIRE COAT CONVERSION.
For The amazing Sevenbase Bombshell.
===============================================================
Author's:

UNP Slim (orginal author): Yoo
Sevenbase Bombshell: Crazy1918

============================================================================================
Description:
Just another conversion for SevenBase...Again!!!.

Craft it at any Tanning Rack.
============================================================================================
============================================================================================
Version: Alpha 3.45.68

Initial Release
============================================================================================
Reqs:
SevenBASE Body
SKSE
Latests version of HDTPhysicsExtension (tested on 12.29)
HDTHighHeels System for the boots addon.
============================================================================================
Compatibility: It should be compatible with almost everything. But Im not really sure, thats why im uploading it for testing..."Yoo said that not me!!! hhhh"

If you use the XP32 hair, be sure to use the compatibility patch. It wont change anything, it will just put his collision objects at a layer different than 0 (10)

============================================================================================

Troubleshooting:

"When I restart a saved game, sometimes the lower part of the coat seems to clip trough legs"
Unequip and reequip so havok can realign the rigid bodies.

"The lower part is warped and is at the other side of the body"
Unequip and reequip, or just move around a bit, the collision objects should do the rest.

"Weight Slider is stuck at 100"
For some reason the body shape do not change please do not ask me because i don't know why.

"Small difference between the body and the feet shape"
I tried to fix it but it is impossible without damaging the outfit, just wear your favorite boots and the problem is fixed.


============================================================================================

FAQ:

"How do I get this dress?"
Craft it at any Tanning Rack.
Or open your console (key Â²) and type "help coat" then "player.additem xxxxxx 1".


"My breasts dont move even when I equip the Havok Object thing"
There are no weights on the breasts, the model was rigged using the vanilla skeleton.

"I changed the shape of your mesh using X tool to fit my body but now the skirt has a lot of clipping"
You have to reshape the collision objects of the XML, since they are fitted to the UNP slim body.


============================================================================================
PERMISION NOTES
You are free to retexture it, convert it to other bodies and dissasemble it to understand how it works, I even encourage you to do it.
============================================================================================

CREDITS:

-Yoo for creating such amazing mods and sharing his work, also for giving free access to his mod. And cose his is amazing.
-Dimon99 for UNP Body.
-Sevennity, Demonhunter, Crosscrusade and wast for the amazing sevenBase Bombshell.
-HydrogenSaysHDT.
-LL community.
-Canderes.
-XP32.
-Bethsoft: For giving us a crippled toolset. And creating such a nice game.
author: Crazy1918
